::Blacknightmare::

Blacknightmare stopped in front of Killfest's  quartes, she took a 
breath and knoked the door in her right arm, as if its were a prey-
bird, was the bat-probe



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Hmm... Looking at someone thousands of miles 
> away...............................
> 
> ::Killfest::
> 
> Killfest nods as he listens to the explanation about the 
clone. "Its 
> fine with me," he says.
> 
> He could deal with the clone later on, but for now he had to have 
> this femm on his side.
> 
> "Blacknightmare's coming," he says to Diamond after he recieves 
> Blacknightmare's transmission.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > DarkMouse::
> > 
> > She looked at Zardus. "You saw all that happened after KitKat 
died. 
> > Well, KitKat had made a clone in the past. I went to the laba nd 
> got

> long 
> > while, but we can make a clone of her.  I am making one right 
now. 
> I 
> > hope you don't mind."
